content: Just starting a thread here for any discussions relating to devdays. Cheers!
The proper link aka.ms/devdays-gino appears to be working again now as well.
HI. Do you have any expierence if EHRs are already implementing subscriptions?

Hi Margarete, I had been hoping that some of the commercial vendors would jump in, but this is a pretty hectic week for most.

That said, I think it's safe to say that generally production implementations are in the 'coming soon' state. Several vendors had issues with the R4-style and have been actively engaged in the changes for R5. As R5 has settled, I believe those vendors are more confident in implementing. Once the backport to R4 IG is complete, I expect adoption to begin in earnest.

Hope this helps!
